page.title: 06CULWORTH CE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The Primary School in the centre of the village was founded in 1789. The original school building later became the Headmaster's house and is now let to Americans. There are approximately 80 children between 4 and 11yrs. At 11 the children transfer to Chenderit School, Middleton Cheney.There are 4 teachers, including the Head,1 secretary,the cook and her assistant,two dinner ladies and a lady who cleans the school. Children come from {CULWORTH, THORPE MANDEVILLE,MORETON PINKNEY,EYDON and surrounding villages} They travel by bus which operates from Banbury. The school has its own outdoor swimming pool which is used daily in the Summer. The majority of children can swim by the time they are 7.The first school computer,an RML480Z,was purchased in 1984.
